          <title>
            <string language="en">Interlayers of sandstone and limestone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwischenlagen des Sandsteins und des Kalksteins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couches intercalaires de grès et de pierre à 
chaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interlayers do sandstone e da pedra calcária</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strati intermedi di arenaria e di calcare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενδιάμεσα στρώματα του ψαμμίτη και του ασβεστόλιθου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intercapas de la piedra arenisca y de la piedra 
caliza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows thin layers of sandstone found between layers of limestone.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Dünnschichten des 
Sandsteins gefunden zwischen Schichten Kalkstein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre des couches minces de grès 
trouvées entre les couches de pierre à chaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra as camadas finas de sandstone
encontradas entre camadas de pedra calcária.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra gli strati sottili di 
arenaria trovati fra gli strati di calcare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει λεπτά στρώματα του 
ψαμμίτη που βρίσκονται μεταξύ των στρωμάτων του ασβεστόλιθου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra las capas delgadas de la 
piedra arenisca encontradas entre las capas de piedra caliza.</string>
          </description>
